queryMap.query: SELECT /* rem4070_s01 */ S.RACE_DAY AS TRADE_DATE ,NVL(SUM(T_CNT_1),0) AS T_CNT_1 ,NVL(SUM(T_CNT_4),0) AS T_CNT_4 ,NVL(SUM(P_CNT),0) AS P_CNT ,NVL(SUM(T_AMT),0) AS T_AMT ,NVL(SUM(P_AMT),0) AS P_AMT FROM ( SELECT TRADE_DATE ,SUM(FEE) AS T_AMT ,SUM(DECODE(CARD_USER_TYPE, '1', CNT, '5', CNT, 0)) AS T_CNT_1 ,SUM(DECODE(CARD_USER_TYPE, '4', CNT, 0)) AS T_CNT_4 ,SUM(CNT) AS T_CNT FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_SUM WHERE COMM_NO = '00' GROUP BY TRADE_DATE ) T, ( SELECT TRADE_DATE ,FEE AS P_AMT ,CNT AS P_CNT FROM TBRC_T_TRADE_KM_SUM ) P, ( SELECT RACE_DAY FROM (SELECT RACE_DAY, MIN(MEET_CD) AS MEET_CD FROM VW_SDL_INFO GROUP BY RACE_DAY) S WHERE 1=1 --AND S.MEET_CD IN ('001','003') AND S.MEET_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND S.RACE_DAY BETWEEN ? AND ? ) S WHERE S.RACE_DAY = T.TRADE_DATE AND S.RACE_DAY = P.TRADE_DATE GROUP BY S.RACE_DAY ORDER BY S.RACE_DAY
